data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mothes, Beatriz, Campos, Maurício, Eckert, Rafael, Lerner, Cléa (2008): Latrunculia (Latrunculia) tetraverticillata sp. nov. (Porifera, Poecilosclerida, Latrunculiidae) from the bathyal region off the coast of Santa Catarina State, Brazil, Southwestern Atlantic. Zootaxa 1744: 59-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181621
